message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm initially offering it at $20,000, which reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to pay more than $10,000 for it. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
